comments:
Evaluators felt that Dr. Sil was a good to excellent professor, some saying he is among the best professors at Penn. Specific praise was mentioned for the clarity in his lectures, his ability to inspire students, his organization, and his ability to get students to fully and thoroughly understand course concepts. Many students remarked that despite the quality of the lectures and instructor, the amount of reading was overwhelming and that the readings became redundant.
*Note: Less than 25% of students submitted written evaluations for this class
